description.collapsedText: The Sony Xperia X Smartphone features a 5-inch Full HD display that offers an immersive viewing experience. This smartphone has a 23 MP camera for sharp pictures and clear videos. It runs on Android and is driven by a quad-core processor. For the user's data storage needs, this smartphone offers a 64 GB internal memory capacity. In addition, this graphite black smartphone is powered by a 2700 mAh battery.
description.captionText: *Please note that all functions, features, specs and any other product information provided on any Sony and subsidiary platform, including but not limited to, benefits, design, pricing, components, performance, availability and capabilities describing the product are subject to change and changed by the company when deemed necessary without any notice or obligation.

contents.content: "Always one step ahead" - this is the tagline the Sony Xperia X is promoted with. It hints at the phone's ability to "predict" the direction of moving objects, thus ensuring accurate focus when taking photos. Speaking of photography, the phone's main camera is a key selling feature, with 23MP of resolution, super-wide viewing angles, and extremely fast autofocus. We're also promised great battery life with Sony's optimizations, added on top of Android 6.0. As for the handset itself, it is designed in typical, stylish Sony fashion, with straight lines and flat sides. For convenience's sake, you get a fingerprint scanner embedded in the power button (not available in the US), as well as front stereo speakers. However, water resistance - a feature found on many other Xperia models - has been skipped.

comments.title: Very satisfied
comments.comment: Love everything about it except the volume on calls needs to be louder the speaker is very loud just not regular calls.  Phone is great and battery life. Takes great pics

comments.title: Easy to use
comments.comment: I needed an upgrade to the Android system and functionality of my old phone so searched on Amazon for a tracfone because I had a balance of gift cards here. I had a little difficulty with set up and needed to contact tracfone for an update to the texting feature that did not happen automatically. I have not added the fingerpirnt or facial recognition features yet. Otherwise it seems to be working well.

comments.title: Shipping very fast
comments.comment:
Big screen. Runs Smooth. 32gb of space. Great deal honestly. I'm happy with the purchase.
What I like about my new android phone is the battery life is excellent and doesn’t drain out fast.

comments.title: Very Satisfied
comments.comment:
Fast shipping. Easy setup to Trackfone.
Pro: Excellent photos
Con: menu control leaves a lot to be desired. But I still rate 5 stars kk.

comments.title: Good phone
comments.comment: I do light gaming as comp games are a tad pricy, and it hardly lags. The battery is great, ive had weeks where I didnt need to charge at all, and thats with hours of listening to music through a bluetooth headset. Wonderful cameras! And facial recognition can still recognise me with and without glasses.

comments.title: Was waiting for a few months before review
comments.comment: I will never buy a flagship $600 phone again. Especially if they keep making "midrange" phones like this one. I'm coming from a iPhone 5s and was a little worried. Not about the OS which has been updated to N by the way. The performance is great and the battery lasts more than a day. I have about 40% left the next morning after a full day/eve of use. The size of the phone is perfect and feels very natural. I get people asking me what kind of phone is that? I am liking not being part of the Apple/Samsung crowds. People should start doing some research before just getting what everyone else has.

data.Features: Oleophobic coating, Scratch-resistant glass, Ambient light sensor, Proximity sensor

data.Processor: Hexa-core, 1800 MHz, ARM Cortex-A72 and ARM Cortex-A53, 64-bit

data.Features: Time-lapse video, Object tracking, EIS, Video calling, Video sharing

data.Keys: Right: Volume control, Camera shutter, Lock/Unlock key

data.Data Speed: LTE-A Cat 6 (300/50 Mbit/s), HSDPA+ (4G) 42.2 Mbit/s, HSUPA 5.76 Mbit/s, UMTS

data.Features: Album art cover, Background playback, Preset equalizer

data.Wi-Fi: 802.11 a, b, g, n, ac, dual-band; Wi-Fi Direct
data.Sensors: Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Compass, Barometer, Step detector, Step counter
data.Other: NFC, UMA (Wi-Fi Calling), Tethering, Computer sync, OTA sync

data.Notifications: Haptic feedback, Music ringtones (MP3), Polyphonic ringtones, Vibration, Flight mode, Silent mode, Speakerphone
data.Other features: Voice dialing, Voice commands, Voice recording, TTY/TDD
